column4: Im having deep problems guys =/ I changed my user and root password yesterday late in the night, now i am trying to get in to my system and I can't remember the password =/ is this problem solvable in any way? I have the Ubuntu-cd..
- when you boot, hit ESC to get to the grub menu, then pick (rescue mode)
- plan B - hit escape, then selelect (rescue mode) but don't hit enter, hit E for edit
- and give me a sec to figure out exactly what to do next...
- select the kernel line, hit E again, a the end of the line, add (space) init=/bin/bash
- then enter, then B for boot
